title: Quake 4 Multiplayer  Universal Hack
description:
Quake 4 Multiplayer MP Online Public Servers (Q4Pause.exe the Universal Quake 4 Hack, "like Crack or Keygen or Serial or Patch or Fix" )
This work for any Quake 4 Version and on any Windows OS

Instructions:

Copy  Q4Pause.exe to your Quake 4 folder (where Quake4.exe exist)
start Q4Pause.exe (this will create Quake4MP.exe) (it removes clAuth and promptKey, so no CD-Key needed anymore. And program keep running as invisible process, for fixing stuck in connection, with message "Waiting for authorization")
start Quake4MP.exe (go Multiplayer select some server and join, your Quake 4 may freeze for around 5 second, its normal, after that screen should fade to black and you connect, remember you always need to run Q4Pause.exe before Quake4MP.exe if you restarted computer, the best solution add Q4Pause.exe to Autorun, Startup folder)

Notes:

If you see MAX_PURE_PAKS(128) error after a while remove some pk4 files from q4base that addons you won't use.
To pop up console press ctrl+alt+~ (tilde) button near escape.
Please seed long as you can.
Spread this to all your friends

Remember:

The popular Quake 4 Versions is:
1.0.0
1.3.0 (Russian servers only, the most players here)
1.4.2
Other Quake 4 versions doesnot have public server (so don't use other versions that is not in this list)
